metadata.name: @tailopez
metadata.description:
This is the 8-digit hexadecimal value for the notorious scammer Tai Lopez.

Every pixel needs a hex value, and by possessing them, you truly own the profile picture.
Learn more about hex values [here](https://twitter.com/siksart/status/1509557037197316105?s=20&t=4kAIpU_R_d20-GEXV-gbsQ)   


The collector of this piece will get the “.TXT” and “.ODT” files containing the 10,000+ hexadecimal values.
